content.body: bakkot: ecmarkup keeps saying it can't find the definition of an AO while it's... right there. i don't see other errors, how do i debug this?
content.formatted_body: bakkot: ecmarkup keeps saying it can't find the definition of an AO while it's... right there. i don't see other errors, how do i debug this?

content.body: the likeliest thing is that it's not recognizing the AO declaration for whatever reason, which you might be able to confirm by building without `--strict` and looking at the output
content.formatted_body: the likeliest thing is that it's not recognizing the AO declaration for whatever reason, which you might be able to confirm by building without --strict and looking at the output

content.body: ah, yes, you need the `<dd>` for it to recognize it
content.formatted_body: ah, yes, you need the <dd> for it to recognize it

content.body: wait what's the rule for that? not everything has a dd
